content.text: Hi, what's your name?
Hi, my name is participant_2. What's yours?
My name is participant_1. What are you excited about these days?
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date! What about you?
I'm excited to meet my new neighbors. I just moved into a new place.
Oh, that's exciting! I love starting my day with a swim. Do you have any hobbies?
I love music. It's always been my number one passion. Do you play any instruments?
I don't play any instruments, but I love to listen to music. I have women calling me all the time.
That's great! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably pop.
Oh, I like pop too. What are some of your favorite pop songs?
I love "Despacito" by Luis Fonsi and Daddy Yankee. What about you?
I love that song too! It's so catchy.
I know, right? It's been on repeat in my head for weeks.
Me too! I love the beat.
Me too! It's so upbeat and fun.
Yeah, it's the perfect song to get you moving.
I know, right? I can't help but dance when I hear it.
Me neither! It's such a good song.
Yeah, it's one of my favorites.
